summary: Landing page sections (Hero, Benefits, Pricing with 3 tiers, Testimonials, Contact with WA/tel + validated form, Footer) are implemented and composed in App.tsx with a white/blue/black premium Tailwind theme and generated images referenced from /assets/generated. However, some requirements/non-goals are violated: Footer copyright text doesn’t match the required “QuickOnline © 2026” string, additional unrequested authentication hooks/providers were added, pricing copy includes admin-panel/order-management features (explicitly non-goals), and additional dominant accent colors (green/yellow/red) are introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer includes exactly “QuickOnline © 2026” and a short tagline about helping local businesses grow online.
missing_requirements.reason: Footer currently renders a dynamic year and uses a different string order/format (“© {currentYear} QuickOnline. All rights reserved.”) instead of the required literal text “QuickOnline © 2026”. The tagline is present, but the copyright text does not meet the exact acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Avoid adding additional dominant accent colors beyond black/blue/white (minor neutrals like grays are acceptable).
missing_requirements.reason: UI introduces strong green (WhatsApp button), yellow (testimonial stars), and red (heart icon), which appear as additional accent colors beyond the requested palette.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / authentication context and authenticated actor recreation logic added to the frontend.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication/user accounts as non-goals; diff adds Internet Identity hooks/provider and actor creation logic tied to identity.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin panel / order management / automation features promoted in the Pricing tier inclusions.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals prohibit admin panel/CMS and e-commerce/order management; pricing content includes “Admin panel” and “Order/contact form” (and “WhatsApp automation”) as package features.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution/marketing link added in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; footer acceptance criteria only mentions “QuickOnline © 2026” and a short tagline.
